intension: Create a Facebook cover image to promote a healthy Italian caprese salad recipe that uses fresh, nutritious ingredients such as tomatoes, mozzarella, and leafy greens. The text emphasizes the importance of healthy food for overall well-being.
globalcaption: The image features a white plate with a variety of food items on it. There are several pieces of broccoli, some of which are placed on the plate, while others are scattered around it. A few carrots can also be seen on the plate, adding to the colorful and healthy assortment of vegetables. The plate is placed on a dining table, making it an inviting and appetizing display of nutritious food.
keywords: food, italian, recipe, sauce, salad, leaves, healthy, vegetables, tomatoes, mozzarella, fruits, green, facebook, cover, fb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a white background with a green border. The green border is decorated with white stars, creating a visually appealing design. The white background serves as a clean and simple backdrop for the green and white stars, making the image aesthetically pleasing

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a close-up view of a piece of food, possibly a vegetable or a piece of meat, sitting on a white surface. The food item is surrounded by a green leafy vegetable, which adds a touch of color and freshness to the scene. The close-up perspective of the image highlights the details of the food item, making it the main focus of the picture
